title: 地皮怎么换公路的方块
author: come123

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
打开plotme的config

worlds:
  plotworld:
    PlotAutoLimit: 1000
    PathWidth: 14
    PlotSize: 32
    BottomBlockId: ''
    WallBlockId: ''
    PlotFloorBlockId: ''
    PlotFillingBlockId: ''
    RoadMainBlockId: ''
    RoadStripeBlockId: ''
    RoadHeight: 64

中间白色的是道路的方块ID~！修改即可，求最佳XD
